description:
General internal refurbishment, including toilet fit out,
passenger and car lift alteration, replacement rear
elevation windows, external redecoration, and new partitions
and ceilings together with the instalation of 2 chiller
units on the rear elevation at first floor level,
as shown by drawing numbers GA-B, GA-LG, GA-G, GA-1,
GA-2, GA-3, GA-4, GA-6, GA-7, GA-8, RW2, SK1, SK2, SK4 and
letter dated 11th November 1998.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - At 1 metre outside the windows of any neighbouring habitable room the level of noise from all plant and machinery shall be at all times at least 5 decibels below the existing background noise levels, expressed in dB(A) at such locations. Where the noise from the plant and machinery is tonal in character the differences in these levels shall be at least 10 dB(A).

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the [adjoining] premises [and the area generally] in accordance with the requirements of policy[ies] RE2[, EN5, EN6 and DS6] of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.

Condition : 2 - For each of the octave band of centre frequencies 63Hz-8KHz inclusive, noise from all plant and machinery shall at all times add not more than one decibel to the ambient noise level expressed as L90  in the same octave band as measured 1 metre outside the window of any residential premises.

Condition : 3 - The extract ventilating system shall be provided with acoustic isolation to prevent the transmission of noise and or vibration to any other parts of the building and adjoining premises.

Condition : 4 - The air conditioning condenser units shall terminate at such
    a height and position so as not to cause detriment to the
    amenity of adjacent occupiers by way of noise and odours.

Condition : 5 - For any process giving rise to fumes either an extract
    system or a totally enclosed recycling system shall be
    provided such that no nuisance from fumes shall be caused to
    the occupiers of any premises.

Condition : 6 - No process shall be carried out on or machinery installed
    which is not such as could be carried on or installed in any
    residential area without detriment to the amenity of that
    area by reason of noise, vibration, smell, fumes, soot, ash,
    dust, or grit.

Condition : 7 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.

Condition : 8 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.

Condition : 9 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.

Condition : 10 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.

Condition : 11 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.

Condition : 12 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.
